Description:
Roles & ResponsibilitiesKey to generating solution-based business development opportunities for some of our largest and most important customers. This means we ll depend on you to use your creativity and expertise to transform ambiguous and often complex opportunities to signifying this role, you ll also support the growth of the business by providing technical sales support for customers and including pre and post client interaction throughout the sales process.
Identify and pursue new business opportunities in the marine and Industrial sector.
Develop and maintain relationships with key customers and industry stakeholders.
Face-to-face customer interactions with set objectives and targets
Grow sales through local channels both through existing key customers and business development/new opportunities.Skills
Skills:
Knowledge in industrial products in UAE market driving sales, business development, in a technical environment
Proven experience in technical sales of industrial or marine products
Strong communication and presentation skills.
Proven track record of achieving sales targets.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
UAE Driving license
